El_Cajon.D.Z. Akin's:
D.Z. Akin's Delicatessen is a New York styled Jewish deli and restaurant located in San Diego, California. The restaurant was open in 1980 by Zvika and Debbie Akin.


== Ratings ==
DZ Akin's has been highly rated and described as "the restaurant that ate San Diego." San Diego Magazine and San Diego Daily Beat considered Akin's the city's best deli.
